body: Is it me or on page 44 the cum on her back suddenly disappeared

Seriously, though, fuck Fakku and their bullshit "we own the rights even though we didn't do the work"
@WalkerRiley, where are these places to look?

There are, you just gotta know where to look.  A few years ago, FAKKU decided they owned all the translation rights to everything under the fucking sun.  They stole most of their translated work from other groups and passed it off as their own.
